Package com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.layout

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LayoutManager
    Classes that implements this interface are for keeping and maintaining the component layout of a container.
    LayoutManager.LaidOutComponent
    This interface represents a component that has been placed on an area.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BorderLayout
    Layout manager inspired by java.awt.BorderLayout
    DefaultLaidOutComponent  
    HorisontalLayout
    Layout which will put components along a horizontal line.
    LayoutParameter
    This class is used for giving instructions to different layout managers of how they should position various components.
    LinearLayout  
    LinearLayout.LinearLayoutComponent  
    VerticalLayout
    Layout which will put components along a vertical line.
